items.info: Developed AI-powered tools for image editing, segmentation, and transformation, focused on enhancing and streamlining creative workflows for users.
responsibilities: Developed an advanced image editor using Konva.js, allowing users to generate images via AI, draw on them, super-scale, cut, and segment elements.
Built and optimized Cuebricâ€™s landing page, ensuring a responsive, visually engaging, and user-friendly experience, improving user engagement and conversion rates.
Collaborated closely with backend teams, integrating gRPC for efficient communication between frontend and backend services.
Designed and implemented a scalable admin panel using Angular, enabling administrators to manage users, content, and application settings with ease.
Implemented secure authentication and role-based access control in the admin panel to safeguard sensitive data and improve operational efficiency.
Collaborated with designers to ensure high-quality UI/UX, contributing to an intuitive and seamless user experience across the platform.

items.info: Conducted presentations on Zone.js and Angular Signals , and achieved recognition for a presentation on Angular Schematics.
responsibilities: Develop efficient and reusable components and front-end solutions, ensuring high application performance adn providing ongoing support
Maintained comprehensive test coverage for all features to guarantee product quality.
Actively participated in re-architecting client-side solutions to improve scalability and maintainability.
Contributed innovative ideas to the product development roadmap.
Collaborated with internal teams to design and architect software solutions.
Played a key role in developing the admin platform for controlling and managing gaming websites, overseeing their activities within Technamin, an iGaming software provider.

items.info: Engaged with Arnology LLC, an outsourcing firm, as a freelance developer, actively participating in customer calls, conducting interviews, and contributing to diverse projects.
responsibilities: Participated in client meetings and calls to gather project requirements, provide updates, and address any concerns.
Conducted interviews to assess client needs, understand project scope, and ensure alignment with business objectives.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to analyze project requirements and define technical solutions.
Developed and maintained web applications for various clients, ensuring adherence to project timelines and quality standards.
Implemented responsive and user-friendly interfaces using Angular, Boostrap, Angular Material, NG Boostrap, SwiperJs, and other relevant technologies.
Integrated third-party libraries and services to enhance application functionality and user experience.
Utilized RxJs and Moment.js for data handling and manipulation, and created custom email templates for communication purposes.
Implemented Google Tags for tracking and analytics purposes to monitor user behavior.
